main.name: Julio Cesar Renteria
main.description: Experienced in Management, Inbound & Outbound Logistics, Inventory Control, and Quality Assurance. Proficient skills in automating processes, developing talent and complex problem-solving
main.bio: Chemical Engineer & Data Analyst with experience in Management, Inbound & Outbound Logistics, Inventory Control, and Quality Assurance. Proficient skills in automating processes, developing talent and complex problem-solving.
main.bio2: I believe in building innovative customer-centric processes to create true value, a customer being anyone who is affected or participates in the production of a good or service. All while maintaining high-quality standards.
main.bio3: Learning and Deep Diving is my superpower, Iâ€™m always curious about new possibilities and eager to explore them.
main.bio4: I'm extremely passionate about Tech, Business and Industry 4.0, my professional purpose is to be part of a growing tech company open to innovation where I can apply my knowledge and ideas for processes or project launches. Always looking to learn and grow as a leader.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
